name: Post-Mining Tenement
description: Your first four walls in a historic, albeit slightly neglected, tenement building.

name: Studio Apartment
description: A cozy and modern studio. Perfect for a single professional starting their career.

name: Suburban Flat
description: A quiet neighborhood away from the city hustle. More space for a reasonable price.

name: Standard Apartment
description: A classic apartment in a well-connected district.

name: Small Family House (A)
description: A charming house with a small garden. The first step to true privacy.

name: Small Family House (B)
description: A solid house in a coastal district. Prestige and comfort for the family.

name: High-Rise Apartment
description: A view of the capital's skyline from the 20th floor. Feel the pulse of the city.

name: Modern Apartment
description: Glass walls and a smart home management system.

name: Luxury Apartment (Ultra)
description: One of the most prestigious addresses in the country. Luxury without compromise.

name: Lakefront House
description: A private pier and the scent of the forest. The perfect escape from business.

name: Seaside House
description: A residence right on the cliff. The sound of waves wakes you up every morning.

name: Sky Penthouse
description: The pinnacle of luxury. Your own rooftop pool on a skyscraper.

name: Luxury Villa
description: A massive estate in the most elite neighborhood.

name: Mediterranean Villa
description: Mediterranean architecture, an olive grove, and azure waters.

name: Atlantic Ocean Villa
description: A modern glass and concrete structure right on the Miami beach.

name: Private Estate
description: A home for the stars. Cinema room, 12 bedrooms, and a helipad.

name: Grand Palace
description: A historic estate with Versailles-style gardens.

name: Hamptons Estate
description: A massive property with a private forest and a golf course.

name: Ultra-Luxury Mansion
description: Gold finishes, an underground garage for 50 cars, and a view of the Burj Khalifa.

name: Private Island Mansion
description: The entire island belongs to you. The ultimate in isolation and luxury.

name: World Island Estate
description: An engineering masterpiece on an artificial archipelago. The most expensive address on the planet.
